descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=4]Mer Preset Pack
This mod includes a Altmer, Dunmer and Orc Preset[/size][/font]

[size=6]Required mods:
[/size]
[size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]NorthbornÂ 
Scars
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty
[/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?][size=3]SkySight Skins[/size]
[/url][size=3][font=Tahoma][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30062/?]Dwemer Beards[/url][/font]
[/size]
[size=6]Recommended mods:[/size]
[size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58338/?]K ENB Pure Light
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34615/?]Mantle of the Silver Hand
[/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32275/?][size=3]SPOA Silver Knight Armor[/size]

[/url][size=6]Installation:[/size]

1. Download my mod and place it at data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets (if you don't have the presets folder, create it)
2. Open Skyrim using SKSE
3. Load any working save file
4. Open the console
5. Type showracemenu
6. Select the Nord Race
7. Look for the slide option "preset slot"
8. Select the slot 15 (to use use the Altmer preset) or 16 (to use the Dunmer preset) or 17 (to use the Orcish preset) and press F9, this should load the character face
9. Customize your character as you please[/center]
author: shadowfake aka taveira
